item.name: TheDivineSpiritAndHumanSpiritInSpecialWrittenForm
item.title: The Divine Spirit and Human Spirit in Special Written Form

body.p: The Divine Spirit and Human Spirit in Special Written Form
In John 3:6 (last line), the scribe of Bodmer Papyrus II (P66) wrote the word ΠΝΑ to signal the divine Spirit, and then wrote out the word ΠΝΕΜΑ to signal the human spirit.
